Some conditions allow configuration of details. Tip You add more than one condition to trigger the rule by clicking to the right of Start. Events must meet all conditions to trigger the rule. Targets can also be refined by additional action conditions (below). The user risk score is at least 50 within the last 2 days. The user risk score is at least 50 within the last 2 days AND leaked accounts in discovered users. Time The weekly period that the rule is applied, and (optional) the start and end dates of the schedule Always checks conditions continuously.
